definition: to rest/to stop doing sth for a period of time/to cease/(imperative) don't
breath/news/interest (on an investment or loan)/to cease/to stop/to rest/Taiwan pr. [xi2]
room/work unit/grave/scabbard/family or clan/one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy

sentences.english: The second floor includes a grandstand area and lounge area.
sentences.chinese: 二層則設有看臺區，並配備專門的休息室。

sentences.english: Gene Bonti helps his wife Bobbie down steps into the couple's family room.
sentences.chinese: 吉恩攙扶妻子博比下樓梯去休息室。

sentences.english: If you get too chilly, there is a warming lobby.
sentences.chinese: 如果你凍着了，可以到休息室裏，那裏提供暖氣。

sentences.english: The two actresses were chatting with in a greenroom.
sentences.chinese: 兩個女演員在演員休息室聊天。

sentences.english: Two outdoor courtyards can be accessed from the main foyer.
sentences.chinese: 主休息室與兩個室外天井相連。

sentences.english: Upon exiting the break room, put on work shoes and boots and coveralls , if needed.
sentences.chinese: 走出休息室後，有必要的話應該穿上工作靴和工作服。

sentences.english: Here, clerestory windows that allow natural light to filter from the lounge through to the bedroom.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏，天窗讓自然光從休息室過濾到臥室。

sentences.english: In an anteroom he hastily opened his briefcase.
sentences.chinese: 在休息室裏，他迅速地打開皮包。

sentences.english: The two and persons would be chatting away in the greenroom .
sentences.chinese: 那兩個人可能在演員休息室跟人聊天。

sentences.english: To refer to a toilet as a “rest room” is miles apart from the Chinese idea of a toilet.
sentences.chinese: “休息室”與中文廁所的概念相距十萬八千里。

sentences.english: A small breakfast-room adjoined the drawing-room.
sentences.chinese: 休息室的緊隔壁是一間小小的早餐室。

sentences.english: Bandai Namco will deliver lounges for Tekken, Ridge Racer, and Soul Calibur.
sentences.chinese: 萬代遊戲將提供休息室的鐵拳，山脊賽車，並刀魂。

sentences.english: Breakout rooms and mother-and-baby rooms are furnished like airport executive lounges.
sentences.chinese: 休息室和母嬰室的陳設好像機場的行政貴賓室。

sentences.english: After dinner we all adjourned to the lounge.
sentences.chinese: 飯後我們都到休息室去了。

sentences.english: I never related the “rest room” with a “toilet”.
sentences.chinese: 我從沒把“休息室”與“廁所”聯繫在一起。

definition: box (in a theater or concert hall)/private room (in a restaurant or karaoke)
compartment (of train, ship etc)/private room at restaurant/rented room for karaoke/hotel room rented by the hour
private room (in a restaurant, or for karaoke etc)/parlor/booth/compartment
